welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Orange Cove, a charming city known for its beautiful landscapes and friendly community. We invite you to explore our town and experience all that it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Visalia Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves regional flights and commuter airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'FAT Free WiFi' from the available networks.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fresno-Chandler Airport, offering domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Fresno-Chandler Airport, primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
